name: Astro-Nomic
description:
Game for the One Click Jam, the objective is travel through all the planets, avoiding and shooting asteroids.

The game on one gif: http://giphy.com/gifs/l3V0xHKa2NRMUWWQg

Controls:

Left click over ship and drag to change move direction

Left click belong ship to shoot

Right Click to pause/unpause (maybe there isn't right button :v)

If you have issues, tell me about that on Twitter: @aaronclaros o kevin031995@gmail,com, also if you like the game, you can send me a message :D
